name: Genomutant
description:
"Experiment gone wrong. Employees have turned into horrific mutants and Maris Corp biolabs is in taters. Jeremiah the janitor will need to keep his wits about him when escaping the facility"

Large facility to explore.
Multiple weapons.
Deadly mutants.
Elements of horror.
be carful.

Student game.
First person shooter developed by team Shockwave at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Art
Henrik Andersson - Maximilian Bergström - Pontus Canbäck - Dennis Praetorius 

Level Design
Jonas Astberg - Hannes Bensryd - Oscar Maris

Programming

Technical Art

Original Release: 17/04/2019
3rd project developed by Shockwave.
